HyperNEAT uses CPPNs to build the neural network phenotypes (and 
evolves C=
PPNs). I see this as an extension. There are about 3 or more 
papers on Hyp=
erNEAT. It should be interesting to you, though it is just 
one of all poss=
ible applications. 

Peter
